DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , efficacy , tolerability RGH-188 relative placebo adult patient ( 18-60 year age ) acute exacerbation schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy RGH-188 Acute Exacerbation Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 60 year age meeting DSMIV criterion schizophrenia ( paranoid type , disorganize type , catatonic type undifferentiated type ) base SCID total PANSS score great equal 80 less equal 120 Patients schizophrenia diagnosis minimum 1 year . Patients exhibit abnormality Physical Examination , abnormal vital sign , ECG , clinical laboratory value . Patients experience first episode psychosis .
